cards.flavor: “This ex-Judge should not be underestimated. Be prepared for anything, and expect to be wrong.”

cards.flavor: “Slingers should be wary of the wild chaos wrought by these elves. Elves that appear alone and unarmed will quickly outnumber and outgun the unprepared.”

cards.flavor: “Wanted for assault and propagation of witchcraft. Slingers should be wary of it and its subjects’ use of anti-magic witchery.”

cards.flavor: “This spy has seen far too much. Detainment is not an option. Kill with extreme prejudice.”
